title: Gesture Recognition System of Cane
description: Developed a cane system for people that utilizes cloud and IoT to interpret gestures and provide accessible commands/actions.

title: Soldier Health Tracking System
description: Designed a soldier monitoring system using embedded circuits and Arduino that utilizes real-time data to track health and location for enhanced safety and efficiency.

title: Crop Disease Detection using CNN
description: Developed a deep learning-based system using CNN to identify crop diseases early, helping prevent losses and improve agricultural productivity.
